::DrillBit::

He replyed to the secret message, "Okie I wont leave or send out anyone
untill the lava goes down. And yes, we do need to discuss an alliance
with the Alliance. But all must be present, and Killfest is on a mission
to the Ark, near the dark side of the moon."
